name: Curse of the Madman
description:
Story Overview:

You are a fallen warrior, who is cursed to gather souls of the underworld's creatures. But these souls, in return, drain your life power.

Features:

  • Innovative progression system, which doesn't allow your character to learn new abilities, but give up existing ones;
  • Highly addictive gameplay;
  • Exploration of randomly-generated castle.

Also, check out my other games or support me on Patreon. I would really appreciate if you did any of those things.
